name: Handmade adjustable striped shirt dress (made to your size)
description:
Striped long black and white cotton shirt with gold tone metal buttons, length can be adjusted using ties that run down either side, so can be worn as a shirt or longer as a dress!

Machine wash at low temperature, do not tumble dry, iron on medium setting.

Select size using measurements below. Item is made to order so please expect to wait up to 10 days for production and delivery, although where possible I will aim to get it to you within a week (a little longer if ordering from outside the uk).

Sizes and measurements:

UK 8/US 4
Bust: 34.5 inches/87.5 cm
Waist: 26.5 inches/67.5 cm
Hips: 35.5 inches/90.5 cm

UK 10/US 6
Bust: 32 inches/81.5 cm
Waist: 24 inches/61 cm
Hips: 33 inches/84 cm

UK 12/ US 8
Bust: 39.5 inches/100.5 cm
Waist: 31.5 inches/80 cm
Hips: 40.5 inches/103 cm

UK 14/US 10
Bust: 37 inches/94 cm
Waist: 29 inches/73.5 cm
Hips: 38 inches/96.5 cm

UK 16/ US 12
Bust: 42 inches/106.5 cm
Waist: 34 inches/86.5 cm
Hips: 43 inches/109 cm

UK 18/US 14
Bust: 44.5 inches/113 cm
Waist: 36.5 inches/93 cm
Hips: 45.5 inches/114.5 cm

name: Handmade vintage style candystripe jumpsuit (made to your size)
description:
Strapless handmade cotton playsuit with faded red and white diagonal stripes. The fabric of this garment has been reversed to give a unique and vintage-looking faded effect. Boned for structure and partly lined, with front pockets and back zip fastening.

Handwash only, iron on cool to medium setting, do not tumble dry.

Select size using measurements below. Item is made to order, so please expect up to 10 days for production and delivery, although where possible I will aim to get it to you within a week (a little longer if ordering from outside the uk).

name: Handmade vintage style gold & black polka dot prom dress (made to your size)
description:
Strapless corset style dress with a full netted circle skirt. The bodice is made from 80's style flocked gold satin with black velvet polka dots, the skirt of the dress is in contrasting black satin, fulled netted and lined, with boning to the bodice for structure and support.

Laces up at the back, with a back zip to the skirt section.

Machine or hand wash at low temperature, do not tumble dry, iron on cool setting

Select size using measurements below. Item is made to order so please expect to wait up to 10 days for production and delivery, although where possible I will aim to get it to you within a week (a little longer if ordering from outside the uk).

name: Handmade pink and black polka dot woven-chain strap dress (made to your size)
description:
Handmade backless dress in hot pink polka dot satin, halterneck style with a woven gold-tone chain strap.

Also has a thin clear/invisible strap across the back for extra support.

Hand wash only, iron on cool setting, do not tumble dry

name: Handmade vintage style long sleeved purple cotton jumpsuit (made to your size)
description:
